name: Pet Store Puppies Slots TV
description:
***** NO ADS ***** NO IAP'S ***** JUST UNLIMITED FREE COINS PLUS VALUE AND FUN! *****

Pet Store Puppies Slots the best Puppy Dog themed lucky vegas casino slot machine / pokie from Mobile Amusements where you can win a massive virtual cash fortune!

With unlimited FREE coins and bonuses, try to win as much money as possible by also playing features such as the Puppy Wheel of Fortune bonus feature plus the Lucky Puppies and Pet Market Money mini-games to accumulate virtual credit prize bonuses.

As you progress through 36 levels in the pet store, you'll be able to place HUGE Max bets progressing up to $10,000 and gain even more fantastic prize bonuses and new features.

Including extra features such as FREE Special Delivery Bonus Spins, $10,000 Big Bonus Bone, 2x Payout Reels feature, Lucky Line, Super Lines, Multi-Free Spins and HUGE Cash Bonuses.

Only true puppy love for these cute pup's will open the 6th reel for a chance to win the BIG Progressive Puppy Jackpot itself!

Don't lose all your cash end up in the Dog House without a bone, get playing and win the biggest pay day ever with Pet Store Puppies Slots woof woof.

Features:

* Improved gameplay and features.
